name: Death Rooms
description:
Originally conceived during Ludum Dare 27.

Survive through the dungeon rooms and go as deep as you can. In each room you'll have limited time to complete a different objective: killing all the monsters, jumping trough platforms and traps to get to the exit, destroying all targets, solving puzzles, no getting hit, etc. Expect more traps, rooms and monsters in the coming versions!

This game is currently on Alpha and on hiatus.
